text: I’m optimistic about our ability to prevent the next pandemic. We have learned so much from COVID, and the innovations have been tremendous. https://t.co/QDfUnEbYeJ

The Global Fund is one of the best investments in global health. Fully funding its programs for the next 3 years is critical to ending HIV, TB, and malaria while helping ensure COVID-19 is the last pandemic. https://t.co/t4N4LhlaUb
I’m hopeful that the world can come together to end this pandemic and prevent the next one. Thanks Dax Shepard, Monica Padman, and @davidfarrier for the great conversation. https://t.co/24IHu2YHxq
The goal of no more pandemics ever is ambitious, but the progress we’ve made over the last two years has already set us on a path to success: https://t.co/mmeGMNrTZs https://t.co/3KsRhEZhNh
I believe that COVID-19 can be the last pandemic. ‘How to Prevent the Next Pandemic’ will explain why. https://t.co/aLGabnIcmx

The Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation @IHME_UW found that improving trust could make a critical difference when it comes to ending this pandemic and preventing the next one. https://t.co/wjRH4tvtUK
